collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and
protect the information that you provide to us when using our website and
services (collectively, the "Services").

By using our Services, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of
your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

## Information We Collect

We collect the following types of information from you when you use our
Services:

  1.
Personal Information: This includes any information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
Document Information: This includes the documents you upload to our Services, as well as any associated metadata.
Usage Information: We automatically collect information about your usage of our Services, such as IP addresses, device information, and browsing activity.
This information is collected through third-party tools like Google Firebase and Google Analytics.

## Cookies and Similar Technologies

We and our third-party partners, such as Google Firebase and Google Analytics,
use cookies and similar technologies, like web beacons, to collect and analyze
usage information, enhance user experience, and provide personalized content
and advertisements.
Google Firebase and Google Analytics for the purpose of collecting and analyzing usage data.

To facilitate this integration, our application accesses, uses,
stores, and shares Google user data as follows:

  1.

Drive API Scopes: Our application utilizes the following two Google Drive API scopes:

     * `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.appdata` – This allows our application to see, create, and delete its own configuration data in your Google Drive.
Data Usage: When you upload or share documents with us through Google Drive, we index and calculate vectors of numbers (known as "embeddings") that represent those documents.

By using our Services, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of

## How We Share Your Information

We share your information with the following third parties:

  1.
Cloud-based database providers, such as AWS, Vercel, and Fly.io, for the purpose of storing and indexing your documents.
Legal and regulatory authorities, when required by law.

We do not sell, rent, or otherwise disclose your personal information to third
parties for their marketing purposes.
